mutants.code:
def calculate_scholarships(N, R, X, Y):
    ineligible_participants = set(X) & set(Y)
    eligible_participants = N - len(ineligible_participants)
    scholarships = min(eligible_participants, R)
    return scholarships

def calculate_scholarships(N, R, X, Y):
    ineligible_participants = set(X) ^ set(Y)
    eligible_participants = N - len(ineligible_participants)
    scholarships = min(eligible_participants, R)
    return scholarships

def calculate_scholarships(N, R, X, Y):
    ineligible_participants = set(X) | set(Y)
    eligible_participants = N + len(ineligible_participants)
    scholarships = min(eligible_participants, R)
    return scholarships

def calculate_scholarships(N, R, X, Y):
    ineligible_participants = set(X) | set(Y)
    eligible_participants = N * len(ineligible_participants)
    scholarships = min(eligible_participants, R)
    return scholarships
